Class DiscardPile

java.lang.Object
DiscardPile
public class DiscardPile extends Object
Represents a pile of discarded cards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DiscardPile()
    Constructs an empty DiscardPile.
    DiscardPile(Card[] initialCards)
    Constructs a new DiscardPile with the specified initial cards.

      public DiscardPile(Card[] initialCards)
      Constructs a new DiscardPile with the specified initial cards.
      Parameters:

      Constructs an empty DiscardPile.

      Gets all cards in the discard pile.

      Array of cards in the discard pile

      public int size()
      Gets the number of cards in the discard pile.

      The size of the discard pile

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the discard pile.

    • removeCard

      public Card removeCard(Card card)
      Removes a specific card from the discard pile.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to remove
      Returns:
      The removed card, or null if the card wasn't found

    • removeAll

      public Card[] removeAll()
      Removes all cards from the discard pile.
      Returns:
      Array of all removed cards

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of all cards in the discard pile.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
